page.title: 12Sunday dinner in Elton
page.content:
MY SUNDAY DINNER First dad cut a wing from the roasted chicken brought home from his work.On the plate I have peas which were frozen when fresh,now boiled:also fried potatoes with gravy made from special powder.Mum buys these at the village shop .Pudding is meringues which are egg white and sugar whipped with a fork,then cooked in the oven.
Another child writes about his evening meal.....
At 6 o'clock it's dinner time.We have bacon fried in a pan,carrots cut in rings cooked on an Electric cooker, potatoes peeled and boiled in a pan with water and then I have a cup of coffee with milk.
